description: This file defines the 'AuditAware' class, a base entity class used for auditing purposes in a Java-based Spring application. It includes fields for created and modified timestamps and users, along with versioning for optimistic locking.

classes.name: AuditAware
classes.description: A base class to provide auditing fields such as creation/modification timestamps and user identifiers, with JPA annotations for persistence and auditing support.

methods.name: getModifiedDate
methods.description: Getter for the last modified timestamp.

methods.name: setModifiedDate
methods.description: Setter for the last modified timestamp.

methods.name: getModifiedBy
methods.description: Getter for the last modifier identifier.

methods.name: setModifiedBy
methods.description: Setter for the last modifier identifier.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.description: Getter for the version field used in optimistic locking.
